input_text.Prompt:
Given a item name and item keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item name:
Kamik Squirt Rain Boot (Toddler/Little Kid)

Item keywords:
100% Rubber
Imported
Rubber sole
Shaft measures approximately 7" from arch
Heel measures approximately 0.5"
Boot opening measures approximately 11" around
Waterproof
Flexible sole
Recyclable
Reflective patches

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Get ready to tackle any weather condition with the Kamik Squirt Rain Boot (Toddler/Little Kid)! Designed with a 100% rubber construction, these boots are completely waterproof, so your little ones can jump in puddles all day long without getting wet. The flexible sole provides excellent traction on slippery surfaces, while the reflective patches add an extra layer of safety for evening adventures. And when the boots get dirty, simply hose them off and let them air dry for easy cleaning. With a shaft measuring approximately 7" from the arch and a heel measuring approximately 0.5", these boots are the perfect size for toddlers and little kids. The boot opening measures approximately 11" around, so they're easy to put on and take off. Plus, the recyclable design makes these boots an eco-friendly choice. Order now and let your little ones enjoy the great outdoors, rain or shine!
input_text.Response B: CafePress brings your passions to life with the perfect item for every occasion. With thousands of designs to choose from, you are certain to find the unique item you've been seeking. Travel in style with this cloth tote bag, professionally printed with your favorite design. These quality natural canvas hand bags are durable, professionally printed, and will satisfy all your reusable shopping bag needs. Also perfect as a beach tote, grocery bag, or book bag, these bags make great gifts for teachers or students, or treat yourself! And with CafePress, your satisfaction is always our promise...buy with confidence, as we offer easy returns and exchanges and a 100% money back guarantee. The bag measures 15"x15" with 26.5" sturdy reinforced fabric handles and small features full side & bottom support gussets. The medium measures 15"x18"x6" with 22" a reinforced fabric handle. Machine wash cold inside out with like colors and tumble dry low for easy and convenient care. And with CafePress, your satisfaction is always our promise...buy with confidence, as we offer easy returns and exchanges and a 100% money back guarantee.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

label_annotations.feedback: Response B is for a completely different product than requested.
